snippet.title: King Arthur: The Druids Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the King Arthur Collection here: http://www.paradoxplaza.com/games/king-arthur-collection
Web page: http://www.kingarthurthewargame.com/main.html
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/KingArthurGame 
Twitter: http://twitter.com/Kingarthurgame 

Set during the events of its predecessor King Arthur: The Role-playing Wargame, this latest expansion features a stand-alone story with a vastly different ruler.  Integrating a new campaign, heroes, monsters, special units and unique skills this real-time strategy expansion will challenge your skills and delight your gaming senses.

Fear the creatures coming back from twilight and respect the way of the druids as you take part in King Arthur: The Druids.  Discover the new complex diplomacy system in which all kings and rules are involved in the process including the Marauders, outlaws, Sidhe courts, high priests as well as some of the noble ladies.  Select your campaign winning conditions while in sandbox mode as your follow the warrior-king, King Ryons, to victory. 

The expansion King Arthur: The Druids is a digital download only release and is available on all leading digital distribution platforms.  The expansion King Arthur: The Druids will require the base game King Arthur -- The Role-playing Wargame for play.

About King Arthur -- The Druids 
In Wales, the beautiful and fiercely independent realm of tribal lords, wizards and dragons, lies its new leader, King Ryons.  Once known as the most dangerous warlord of the land, King Ryons wants to restore the power of the Old Faith in Britannia and he gets what he wants. Set in the events of King Arthur: The Role-playing Wargame, King Arthur-Druids follows a stand-alone story featuring 30+ hours of gameplay.   Determine your victory conditions as you battle in the free sandbox gaming mode and conquer Britannia for the Old Faith.
